channel.title: python on My Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in python on My Portfolio

item.title: EazyPredict ML module
item.description: EazyPredict - Running and comparing multiple ML models at once # Welcome to the world of ‘EazyPredict’, a Python module that aims to make trying out multiple prediction algorithms as simple and efficient as possible.

item.title: Developing a scraper to get NLP data using Beautiful Soup and python!
item.description: The aim of this blog is to guide individuals in comprehending the methodology and tactics required to construct a web scraper. The problem with low resource languages for NLP # When getting started with an NLP project, the initial bottleneck is always acquiring relevant data.

item.title: kNN algorithm explained intuitively!
item.description: In this blog we go through the kNN algorithm logic, implement it from scratch in python and apply it on the MNIST digit dataset kNN algorithm explained intuitively! # Prerequisites # machine learning, supervised vs unsupervised ML, classification vs regression
